DOC.brief_summary: In vitro , Vitamin-E diffuse , highly cross-linked polyethylene ( PE ) show superior wear resistance improve mechanical property compare standard highly cross-linked PE . There yet publish study vitamin-E diffuse PE although several trial ongoing . All trial use uncemented acetabular cup intend biological fixation . In many country standard fixation method acetabular component bone-cement . The Vitamin-E use implant alfa-tocopherol , lipid-soluble antioxidant oily consistency ; theoretically affect cement fixation use acetabular component . The aim study compare migration , linear wear clinical result two type cement acetabular cup .
DOC.brief_title: Migration Head Penetration Vitamin-E Diffused Cemented Polyethylene Cup Total Hip Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Primary osteoarthritis hip Willingness ability follow studyprotocol Inflammatory arthritis secondary osteoarthritis .
